decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed drains and drainage connections would be permitted development, as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class G (C) (ii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Demolition of an existing rear conservatory and side corridor, erection of part two storey/part single storey rear, single storey side and front porch enclosure extension. Roof alteration with enlargement of existing loft space. Installation of solar panels. Erection of boundary wall and gates with front boundary treatments.'
